io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui

Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.AbstractListenerView
      • io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.Frame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.craigmiller160.mvp.core.PropertyChangeView, io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.ListenerView, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    @NotThreadSafe
public class Frame
extends io.craigmiller160.mvp.listener.AbstractListenerView
    A GUI frame that is the container for this program. It uses blank placeholder panels which are replaced by additional components from separate classes that are added at runtime. Setter methods are provided to add the external components and substitute them for the blank ones.

    Like all GUI classes in this program, this class separates its instantiation code from its assembly code for maximum flexibility. This flexibility is fully exploited by the insertion of additional components at runtime, replacing blank placeholder components in the code.

    THREAD SAFETY: Swing is NOT thread safe.

    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    craig
